kickstart.description:
The Ganglia Receptor daemon for Rocks clusters. Coordinates several vital Rocks services, such as 411 and all custom ganglia metrics, used for mpd-ring, cluster-top, and queue monitoring.
This daemon speaks and listens on the ganglia multicast/broadcast channels within the cluster private network.
